description: Lists the tags for the specified resource. For sample policies that use tags, see Amazon Connect Identity-Based Policy Examples in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. All Amazon Connect resources (instances, queues, flows, routing profiles, etc) have an ARN. To locate the ARN for an instance, for example, see Find your Amazon Connect instance ID/ARN.
